description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Corfu, Greece. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Five-Star Greek Island Escape with Private Beach, Corfu's Highest Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the Mediterranean charm of Angsana Corfu Resort & Spa, a luxurious five-star retreat perched atop a hill overlooking the azure Ionian Sea. This Hellenic sanctuary offers an exquisite blend of traditional Greek hospitality and Asian wellness philosophies. Explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Old Town of Corfu, float in the 1000sqm infinity pool, savour the flavours of the Mediterranean at the hotel's five oceanfront venues, or unwind at the indulgent Angsana Spa.

hotels.title: Modern Beachfront Corfu Escape with Private Beach, Infinity Pool, Four Restaurants & Day Spa
hotels.description: Set on the shimmering waters of the Ionian Sea, this elegant beachfront stay seamlessly blends traditional Greek charm with modern luxury. Soak up breathtaking views of the sparkling sea or Gouvia Marina, stroll along one of two private beaches, cool off in the resort's infinity pool or indulge in rejuvenating treatments at the state-of-the-art wellness spa. Explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Corfu Town, just a short drive away, or keep busy with a selection of in-house activities including yoga, cooking classes and Syrtaki dancing. After an adventurous day, dine to your heart's content across four restaurants, offering a diverse selection of Mediterranean, seafood and international fare, or relax with a cocktail at one of the two bars.

hotels.vendor_name: Corfu Imperial, A Grecotel Resort to Live
hotels.title: Corfu Oceanfront Island Elegance with Private Beach, Eight Bars & Restaurants & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Experience the ultimate Greek island getaway at this luxurious five-star resort, set against the stunning backdrop of the sapphire Ionian Sea. With sleek, modern design accented by vintage charm, the resort exudes glamour from the moment you arrive. Enjoy access to four secluded beaches, three sparkling pools and the indulgent Elixir spa. Elevate your Mediterranean escape with diverse dining options. Start your day with breakfast at the airy Mon Repos, then treat yourself to a gourmet experience at the elegant Aristos restaurant or the unique Yali Seafood, which floats directly on the water. Beyond the resort, discover Corfu's rich heritage with a short drive to the UNESCO-listed Old Town, home to Venetian fortresses and historic buildings. Nestled on a private peninsula amidst Corfuâ€™s sun-soaked scenery, Corfu Imperial, A Grecotel Resort is the perfect base to explore the Emerald Island, renowned for its lush greenery and vibrant history.

hotels.title: Opulent Corfu Seaside Suites in 18th-Century Olive Mill with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Located in an olive grove on Corfu's southeastern coast, The Olivar Suites honours its heritage as a former 18th-century olive oil mill. A beautiful outdoor pool serves as the heart of the resort, while Flya restaurant celebrates Mediterranean flavours using local ingredients and the hotel's herb garden. The spa is a wellness sanctuary, offering treatments inspired by ancient Greek healing practices. Perched along the pristine shores of Messonghi Beach, this resort is your gateway to relaxation and adventure. Spend mornings exploring the traditional fishing village of Messonghi, and afternoons discovering hidden coves by private boat or taking scenic drives through the hills to reach Corfu's UNESCO-listed Old Town, just 30 minutes away.

hotels.title: Five-Star Corfu Adults-Only Suites with Private Beach & Six Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the sun-drenched Grecian allure of Nido, Mar-Bella Collection, a stylish adults-only sanctuary perched on Corfu's southeastern coast. Embrace romantic seclusion at this pastel-hued abode, boasting luxurious suites, a tranquil outdoor infinity pool, plush spa and six exquisite restaurants and bars. Take a stroll on the private beach and take in spellbinding vistas of the azure Ionian Sea, or if you wish to explore, the UNESCO-listed Corfu Old Town is moments away.
